text: wmn alnaas man yadkhul fi al'islam ealaa daef wshkkin, fyebd allah ealaa trddh, kaladhi yaqif ealaa taraf jabal 'aw hayt la yatamasak fi wqfth, wayarbit 'iimanah bdnyah, fa'iina eash fi sihat wsaeat aistamara ealaa ebadth, wa'iin hasal lah abtla' bmkrwh wshdt eizana shwm dhlk 'iilaa dynh, farajae eanh kaman yanqalib ealaa wajhah baed astqamt, fahu bdhlk qad khasir aldnya; 'iidh la yghyir kfruh ma quddir lah fi dnyah, wakhasir alakhirat bidukhulih alnar, wdhlk khsran byin wadh. yaebud dhlk alkhasr min dun allah ma la yaduruh 'iina trkh, wala yanfaeuh 'iidha ebdh, dhlk hu aldalal albaeid ean alhq. yadeu man drruh almhqq 'aqrab min nfeh, qbh dhlk almebwd nsyrana, wqbh eshyrana
